name: Buluk Mayan Warfare
description: Use Sword and Magic against your enemies in this Aztec/Mayan themed Hack n Slash. 4 weapon styles, research spells, craft weapons and armor using resources gained from conquered cities. Rise through the ranks of the Mayan Military with your customizable warrior.

name: Hellgate
description:
Developed by Horny Dog and published by Jester Interactive, Hellgate was going to be a third person shooter for the Dreamcast, where to kill demons and going around for the levels with a motorcycle. Sadly the game was cancelled, as we can read on the old Horny Dog website: “The Sega announcement that they were ceasing production of Dreamcast hardware wasn’t much of a help, as well as the fact one or two members of our team didn’t have the game’s best interest at heart. […] We had spent 15 months developing the title, and although many of us felt we achieved so much, it wasn’t enough to save the title.” 
 
The developer's website described Hellgate as follows: "Imagine a crossover between Quake and WipeOut. Got that image? Hellgate meshes these two genres, with high speed at your fingertips, as well as some meaty weaponry! There will be four gigantic realms to conquer, as well as ten formidable weapons to defeat the many demons and monsters lurking within Hell." 
 
"We will also be supporting Dreamcast’s online capabilities with online Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Sumo and Time Trial modes, and also feature offline 4 player Deathmatch and link-up Deathmatch modes. The exciting thing is, Hellgate could well be the first Dreamcast game to support 12 – yes – 12 people." 
 
In March 2009, a playable beta was leaked online.

name: Low-Fi
description: As the player, you are “low-fi”, the street name given to those who cannot merge with the platform, a ubiquitous virtual reality simulation where most of the population now live their lives. You are a police officer and have been transferred to a particularly crime ridden section of city-block 303. The only inhabitants of note in your jurisdiction are other low-fi, and the human intelligence (or lower) artificial life forms who have remained among the citizens after the AI singularity.

name: Shadows of Kepler
description: Shadows of Kepler is a Sci-Fi Horror Survival game with RPG elements which brings an unique style in first person. Walking on the shoes of Seargent Cooper and help him make the right choices in this terrifying journey. Don't let the planet Kepler tame you, keep the human hope alive.

name: G:nom
description: G.NOM is an action rogue-lite game you awaken as an experiment subject in a lab full of creatures where you need to hunt and eat them. Explore the mysterious lab, make use of abandoned lab equipments, research various genetic mutations, evolve into more powerful forms and uncover secrets of the lab!

name: Fight of Animals: Legend of the Strongest Creature
In the Black
description: In The Black is a PC space combat sim based on realism from the designers of Crysis, MechWarrior 2, and X-Wing.

name: Hordes.io
description:
Find your clan, survive large scale open world PVP and arenas, hunt down bosses and fight your way to the top in this group oriented MMORPG.
Hordes.io is a free to play 3D Multiplayer Browsergame in Open Beta.

name: Mob Wars: La Cosa Nostra
description: Fight your way up the ranks of mobsters against millions of players in the most successful online mafia wars game of all time!

name: Vladimir Putin Style
description: Love Hardbass, Play Balalaika, Ride Bears and Babushkas? Madly admire the alpha male style of walking of President Putin? Then this game is for you! Unique Game for True Patriots, Comrades of Motherland and KGB Lovers! Cheeki Breeki Approved.

name: War and Magic
description: War and Magic is a free MMORPG wargame combining real-time and turn-based tactical gameplays that creatively inserted chessboard gameplay into battles. As the lord, you could manage the entire city and use military strategies to fight other lords. Also, you could fight in person to maximize your tactical wisdom in chessboard battle playing, marshalling heroes and soldiers to win every battle.

name: GrimmStar
description: After a sudden and cataclysmic invasion, the Worlds of Terra are devastated. What remains of mankind are either scattered throughout the stars or reduced to migrant fleets. Guide the fate of the human race in a desperate struggle to evade the horrors from beyond our galaxy and uncover an ancient mystery that could turn the tides of war...

name: Gravastar
description: Gravastar is a sci-fi fantasy JRPG (Japanese-style Role Playing Game) for PC and consoles that combines a traditional JRPG aesthetic with a unique and fast-paced, turn-based battle system inspired by 2D arcade fighting games. The battle system in Gravastar is set apart from traditional turn-based JRPGs by its real-time button-combo input system. Alter the flow of battle, master your character's movesets, build enormous combos, and string together chains to dispatch your foes.

name: Summer Rose Court
description: A RWBY Visual Novel, set in a fantasy alternate universe

name: Worlds: History Simulator
description: 'Worlds' is a simulator intended to recreate human history all the way from its origins in alternate world settings.

name: Russia 2055
description: In year 2055 US Forces and Russian Military conflict halts as they defend earth from the first alien invasion that first started in Russia. Players will be able to take the role as regular foot infantry, pilot Russian bipedal AA Mechs, or partake in aerial combat on a 64 Multiplayer server.

name: Curzon Line
description: Curzon Line is an open world story-driven video game, depicting the events unfolding in the immediate aftermath of nuclear war.

name: The Hive
description: The Hive is a new round based First-Person-Looter-Shooter set in a world where folklores and legends are part of the reality. The Hive combines competitive PVP and RPG elements to deliver a unique experience.

name: I.G.I. Origins
description: The prequel to 2000's Project I.G.I.: Experience a high octane thrill ride through a spy fantasy world of gadgets and guns against the vivid, sumptuous backdrop of the 1980s. Unravel a mystery that threatens to plunge the world into a new era of nuclear annihilation. You're going in.

name: Day Seven
description: Every 20 seconds, a person goes missing in the US. Terrence has been slowly losing his mind at a dead-end job. His desolate late-night commute may make him lose a lot more than that!

name: Hollow Cries
description:
Play as a young child struggling with issues of being alone, and trying to find answers to why life ends. But sometimes a child can make mistakes and can have poor judgment at times, as you try to find peace you decide to use Ouija board to find the truth and stop the feeling of being alone. Yet the things that talk back in the dark aren’t always what they seem. The more you ask, the more you feed your curiosity and the more dangerous it becomes. 
 
FEATURES 
- Simple controls 
- Randomized AI 
- Free Roam 
- Unlockable modes

name: Escapatoria
description:
Many maps available to complete, unlock all the characters and embark on an adventure in the Halloween pack, dark levels and difficult to complete! 
 
- 2400 Levels available. 
- 19 Different maps. 
- 20 Characters to unlock. 
- 8 Maps to unlock. 
- Simple swipe movement system. 
- Cool pixel art and 8-Bits sounds.

name: Styrateg
description: The heavy clouds on the horizon gather as there are troubled times to come. The kingdom of a wise king is in danger. Legions of unearthly adversaries come from the unknown to spread the plague and disease across the ancient kingdom.

name: Battle Mech Frontier
description: Battle Mech Frontier is a turn-based artillery game where two teams face each-other over a fully-destructible terrain and try different strategies to knock each other out until only one side is standing.

name: Plunder Pack
description: A rag-tag group of animals makes it their mission to steal from the rich to give to the poor - and it's up to you to plan the heist! Choose your pack of thieves, plunder evil corporations and help the people take back their city.

name: Arima
description: Arima is a musical game which narrative and objectives are visually and sound marked. It is an Adventure set in a fantastic world. The player will live an auditory experience, where the mechanics revolve around music.

name: Sword of the Stars: The Pit - Osmium Edition: Juggernaut
Set Sail: Caribbean
description: Hard times have come for the good-willed Caribbean governor, Sir Francis, as the creditors are knocking on his door. Marrying off profitably his own daughter Catherine seems like the only way to pay his debts.

name: Chuchel: Cherry Edition
description:
Cherry Edition contains the full game, 44-minute original soundtrack from the acclaimed band DVA and an 89-page digital art book with concepts and sketches by the creator Jaromir Plachy. "CHUCHEL Sans" OpenType font included. 
 
CHUCHEL is a comedy adventure game from the creators of Machinarium, Botanicula and Samorost. Join the hairy hero Chuchel and his rival Kekel as they will be facing numerous puzzles and challenges on their quest to retrieve the precious cherry!

name: Surviving Mars: Project Laika
description: Animals have arrived at the domes and are here to make colony life better for everyone. Surviving Mars: Project Laika adds a variety of pets and livestock that you can use to benefit your colony and improve life on the Red Planet.

name: Train Valley 2: Passenger Flow
description: The good old gameplay of the original Train Valley comes to the modern rails of Train Valley 2 in the Passenger Flow DLC.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Lord of Skulls
description:
This DLC adds the Lord of Skulls as a new neutral unit roaming the battlefields of Gladius Prime.

The Lord of Skulls is a massive behemoth, one of the strongest units in the game.

name: Judgment: Apocalypse Survival Simulation - Desert Edition
Galactic Civilizations III: Villains of Star Control
This Dead Winter
description:
This Dead Winter is a dark fantasy adventure game, set in ancient woodland gripped by an enduring winter. The world has been described as hauntingly beautiful. Completely handcrafted, every asset in the game made from scratch for this unique world. Varied and obsessively detailed, there's something to discover around every corner.

The core of the game takes place in a mysterious hanging valley - you've lived in the shadow of the valley your whole life until you're forced to travel to this strange place when your cub is taken to the heart of the forest that grows there.

It features a dynamic season changing, a metroidvania inspired world layout, secret areas and collectables. Continuously branch out and visit new places at your own pace in the valley, there will be no rush or timer placed on your discovery of this land.

The gameplay in This Dead Winter is inspired by the metroidvania genre. It will be based on gaining new and unexpected abilities that allow you to access different areas, overcome obstacles and solve puzzles.

As you travel through the hanging valley your fox is bestowed new abilities from the various inhabitants and ruins. Starting with a fiery dash that can be used to traverse your way around the world and possess creatures and places of fire.

You're far from alone in the world of This Dead Winter and can expect to run into various different characters, kind, malevolent and indifferent.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Turtle Wars
Dead In Vinland: Norse Side Stories
description: The secondary characters now have more interactions with the main family, but also with each other! This DLC adds more flavour to your favourite characters, adding new intrigues and romances.

name: Sword of the Stars: The Pit - Osmium Edition
Way of the Samurai 3: Deluxe Edition
Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of Dana - Ultimate Resource Bundle
Man O' War: Corsair - Fell Cargo
Battletech: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition of Battletech provides intrepid MechCommanders with the full game as well as exclusive access to the game's official soundtrack, insight into the design of Battletech, and a variety of additional goodies.

name: Ancestors Legacy: Complete Edition
description:
Ancestors Legacy is a history-inspired, real-time strategy game influenced by historical events in the Middle Ages. The game combines resource management and base building with large-scale, squad-based battles across vast battlefields, all rendered in superb detail with Unreal Engine 4. Experience medieval bloodshed like never before thanks to the cinematic action camera that puts you right in the middle of the battle at the press of a button.

Ancestors Legacy - Complete Edition includes the following items:
- Ancestors Legacy
- Ancestors Legacy - Digital Soundtrack
- Ancestors Legacy - Digital Artbook
- Ancestors Legacy - Saladin’s Conquest DLC

name: Whispers of a Machine: Blue Edition
War for the Overworld: Ultimate Edition
Galactic Civilizations III: Precursor Worlds
description: Unlock the mysteries of the Precursors and explore long forgotten ancient worlds. Discover several new types of planets, deal with unexpected new colony events, and solve the riddles of perplexing anomalies.

name: Dreams of Fear
description: Dreams of Fear is a turn-based RPG with DDR elements inspired by EarthBound and Persona. Dreams of Fear has a vast world with plenty of characters to interact with. You play as a young kid exploring the various towns around the world, solving people’s problems, and trying to find your long-lost brother. What choices will you make?

name: Divinity: Original Sin - Enhanced Edition Collector's Edition
The Last Federation: The Lost Technologies
description: Dozens of new technologies, a new technology-focused game mode, and technology "side effects" on even existing techs. Champion enemies also make their first appearance in combat. Plus new turrets, abilities, events, alliances, a new planet, type, and more!

name: Two Worlds II: Echoes of the Dark Past 2
description: Your Two Worlds II multiplayer adventure continues in "Echoes of the Dark Past II": Three brand new domains await you, each with two unique paths, for a total of six never-before-seen maps to explore!

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Star Control Heroes
Orwell: Ignorance is Strength Seasons Complete
My Memory of Us: Collector's Edition
Oriental Empires: Genghis
description: Participate in the extraordinary rise of Genghis Khan, in Oriental Empires: Genghis. Begin as a homeless outcast and become the legendary warrior in a brand new campaign. New maps, buildings, units, resources, technologies and characters enrich and expand your quest to become a true emperor.

name: Sudden Strike 4: Road to Dunkirk
description: In Sudden Strike 4: Road to Dunkirk, relive battles leading up to one of the world‘s most daring military rescue missions. Following the invasion of France in May 1940, the British Expeditionary Force and parts of the French Army had retreated to Dunkirk and awaited evacuation, while German forces had been closing in to crush them.

name: Blood & Gold: Caribbean! - The Zombiest Adventures
Fantasy General II: Invasion Hero Edition
Irony Curtain: From Matryoshka with Love - Revolutionary Edition
Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Oblivion
Battlezone 98 Redux: The Red Odyssey
description: With war escalating in the wide reaches of space, the Americans take to Jupiter and its moons in pursuit of the Russians and powerful technology. On the previously quiet satellite of Ganymede, the US forces discover an unexpected threat, with the power to carve its own place in history...

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Moraine Lake
description: Famous glacial lake in Canada. The lake contains numerous species of Trout and Zander. Of course, those are not the only species found here. Maybe you should find out for yourself about the secrets that are hiding in this lake?

name: The Bard's Tale IV: Director's Cut - Deluxe Edition
Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Gauntlet
X4: Foundations - Collector's Edition
description:
The X Universe Digital Artbook 2018: Enjoy the concept art behind the X universe. 
  X Novel: Nopileos by Helge Kautz as English and German eBook. 
  Digital Soundtrack: Download the music, including exclusive versions of the trailer and teaser music in highest possible quality. 
  Access to the first two expansions for X4: Foundations. 
    X4: Split Vendetta: planned to be released in Q1 2020 
    Second expansion planned to be released later 
 
 
The bonus content will be placed in your X4 installation folder: 
...Steam\SteamApps\common\X4 Foundations\Bonus Content

name: The World Next Door: Deluxe Edition
Mabeop Cheonjamun DS 2: The Final Hanja Magic
Production Line: Doors that go like this
description: Are you tired of making cars that are easy to get into? tired of making cars that look sensible and are driven by ordinary people? The 'Doors that go like this' expansion contains everything you need for a billionaires mid-life crisis.

name: Celestian Tales: Old North - Howl of the Ravager
description: Howl of the Ravager sheds light to events which took place more than twenty years before Celestian Tales: Old North. Glimpse upon the life of young Severin Leroux and witness his first steps to become a hero of the realm.

name: Two Worlds II: Echoes of the Dark Past
description: Return to Antaloor in a brand-new, three-map multiplayer adventure that bridges the events of "Two Worlds II" and "Call of the Tenebrae"!

name: Danmaku Unlimited
description: Set in the not so distant future, Danmaku Unlimited places you in a world that is gripped by destruction, caused by the will of nature to cleanse the earth of mankind that for long has been abusing her gifts. The manifestation of her wrath comes in the form of six goddesses, or Valkyrias. As beautiful as they are deadly, they wield the power to transform and re-purpose man's creation to their cause.

name: The Secret Society - Hidden Objects Mystery
Panzer Campaigns: Salerno '43 Gold
description: Salerno '43 - The invasion of Salerno in September 1943 and Anzio in January 1944 were two very different operations. At Salerno the US and British troops ran into a stubborn enemy determine to throw them back into the sea. So, five months later at Anzio, they acted with caution, building up their force before moving inland - but the delay allowed the Germans to pocket them into the beachhead - one that proved difficult and costly to break out of. In this Panzer Campaign title you can try your hand in command of both of these critical Allied amphibious operations that lead up to Normandy. As a bonus you can also play the German Air Assault on Crete in 1941 to round out the action in the Mediterranean.

name: Panzer Campaigns: El Alamein '42 Gold
description: In the summer of 1942, the Afrika Korps was approaching its high-water mark. In a month-long struggle than began at Gazala, Rommel had defeated the 8th Army and driven the British back to Egypt, once again surrounding Tobruk, a prize that eluded him the previous year. Then in a surprise move, he doubled back, and captured Tobruk in a single day before turning his Panzer Army once again toward Alexandria, Cairo and the Nile. But the British would deny him the ultimate prize with a heroic stand at a lonely, unheard of railway stop known as El Alamein.

name: Panzer Campaigns: Japan '45
description: With the capture of Okinawa and the Philippines in 1945, the Allies had captured important territory in the western Pacific from which to base air, sea and land assets with which to engage in an invasion of the Japanese main islands. They called the entire project "Operation Downfall" and the first part of this colossal undertaking was called "Operation Olympic." The goal of Olympic was to capture airfields and ports in the southern half of the island of Kyushu from which they could use for the next phase of Downfall which was called "Operation Coronet," the invasion of the island of Honshu.

name: Panzer Campaigns: Bulge '44 Gold
description: It is late 1944 and the Western Allies are catching their breath after racing across France. Standing at the frontier of Germany, the end of the war seems at hand. The Germans have other ideas, however. For the second time in the war, the Germans pull off a surprise attack in the Ardennes. Under the cover of bad weather that grounds Allied air power the secretly assembled Panzer Armees shakes the ground with a dawn attack. Allied units, shocked and alone in their scattered positions are grimly determined to accomplish the impossible. In the desperate hours ahead, these brave and heroic men will decide the war on the Western Front.

name: Panzer Campaigns: Normandy '44 Gold
description:
Normandy '44 is an operational level simulation of the D-Day landings and subsequent battles to move inland fighting your way off the beaches. This is a battle largely of attrition where you will slug your way through bocage to break the dead lock in one of the best know and record campaigns in history. After 4 years of German occupation, the Allied forces in England were ready to liberate France. An enormous force of infantry, armoured, airborne naval, and air forces stood poised to strike at the German beach fortifications and dense bocage of Normandy. All hopes for the liberation of France and the end of World War II would depend on the success or failure of this invasion. Will Eisenhower's plan succeed, or will Rommel's panzers throw the Allied invasion back into the sea?

Normandy '44 includes 96 Scenarios – covering all sizes and situations, including a solo tutorial scenario plus specialized versions for both head to head play and vs. the computer AI.

name: Panzer Campaigns: Stalingrad '42 Gold
description: Toward the end of 1942, the German High Command saw that the tide on the East Front had reached its peak. After the setback in front of Moscow in 1941, the mighty German Army surged forward again in the summer of '42. After defeating an ill-fated Soviet summer offensive at Kharkov in May, they drove onward to the outskirts of Stalingrad by the late summer of that year. This is where the Stalingrad '42 game picks up the fight, including a number of scenarios covering the drive to the Volga. After several months of bloody house to house fighting in the fall, the Soviet positions were reduced to pockets of rubble, barely 300 meters from the Volga. As the season turned to winter, Hitler remained fixated on taking the city, ultimately leading to disaster for his troops. He had badly underestimated the Soviet army's ability to mount an offensive on his flanks. The Russians cut through weak, poorly equipped, Rumanian troops and encircled the entire Sixth Army. In Stalingrad '42 you can re-fight this titanic struggle, exploring both the historical situation in addition to a number of plausible "What If" situations; a German retreat, a corseted flank defense, or a powerful panzer rescue force made available had Rommel been successful at El Alamein.

name: Six Rules
description:
Hung on a piece on thread in the foyer, a bamboo scroll read:

Rules
1) You must not let any strangers into the house. Preferably not even the forest where we reside in.
2) If you spot any strangers loitering around the property, alert us immediately.
3) You may converse with strangers as a gesture of friendliness, but never tell them where the house is located. We are hiding for safety, after all.
4) Don’t accept things from trespassers. Don’t give things to trespassers, either.
5) Never, I repeat, never talk to those of the Taira family.
6) Got it? Don’t trust the Taira Clan.

Minamoto no Ryouji, a 12th-century Japanese boy of the Minamoto clan read those rules, and knew them all by heart. Never in his life would he even dream of breaking even one of them. That is, until that one day he met a girl named Yuki in the heart of the winter fields.

Six Rules is a short story about a little boy, a little girl, and a spiritual journey through a snow-strewn forest of ancient Japan.

name: Dekitayo Mama! Mitsugo no Kuma-San - Onna no Ko
Wandering Hamster
description:
Lord Hasim has been overthrown, plips run rampant, and a menacing evil lurks in the shadows... or is it a cactus? What hamster is spiffy enough to save the world? Bob!

Wandering Hamster is the OHRRPGCE game developed by OHRRPGCE's developer James Paige. It is occasionally referred to in examples.

name: Little Witch Reinette: Swan no Namida Rhapsody
Lightyears from Home
description: Story-based survival metroidvania about an engineer following clues to an unknown galaxy in search of someone who had long gone missing.

name: Zombies Overloaded
description:
Zombies are everywhere! Arcade-inspired shooter, where relentless waves of undead creeps shamble, sprint, and swarm at you in a cramped room! Your only chance? A wild arsenal of weapons and just enough skill (and blind LUCK!) to keep the hordes at bay.

Strap in and embrace the chaos! Trapped in an inescapable room, you’ll take on endless waves of zombies, mowing them down by the hundreds with randomly spawning weapons. Every five waves, a pissed off boss shows up to ruin your day. Survival demands quick reflexes, clever strategy, and just a pinch of madness! First release contains 2 rooms, No-Escape and Cornered. Try to master each!

name: Project Adventure Game: The Cycle of the Cave
Habu Yoshiharu Shogi de Kitaeru: Ketsudanryoku DS
Ancients Reborn
description:
Ancients Reborn is a popular MMORPG that combines the intricate mechanics of a modern online role-playing game, with the nostalgic lineage of old-school MMORPG adventure games. Play casually with your friends or as a hardcore adventurer and destroy your enemies in battle.
Beautifully Crafted Fantasy Adventure
A hand-crafted vibrant 3D fantasy world with a feel similar to classic old-school MMO role-playing games.
Feel the nostalgia of a classic dungeon crawling experience with unique styles of play and a modern look and feel. Adventure your way through a glorious open world.
Elegant Offline Automation System

name: Balmung Cycle Part I: The Messenger and the Heretic
Rigor Mortis
description: Rigor Mortis is a survival horror 3D game that follows the journey of a nutcracker that unexpectedly comes to life while he tries to figure out the mysteries that lie behind his existence. With puzzles, exploration, action and suspense, the game brings back the nostalgia of old horror games through Playstation 1-inspired graphics and mechanics.

name: Idaten Jump DS: Moero! Flame Kaiser
Majime ni Fumajime Kaiketsu Zorori - Kyoufu no Takarabako
Mirakuru! Mimika DS
description: It is a Japan-exlusive mix of adventure and visual novel focused on cooking.

name: Monster Farm DS 2: Yomigaeru! Master Breeder Densetsu
Lupin Sansei: Umi ni Kieta Hihou
Streamer's Life
description: RPG-Simulation game where you can create your own streamer and see whether you can overcome difficulties of being streamer or not.

name: Oha Star 645: Musshees no Fushigi na Nouen - Yoshimoto Geinin to Tomodachi Net
Ochaken no Daibouken: Honwaku Yumemiru Sekai Ryoukou
Ochaken no Daibouken 2: Yume Ippai no Omocha Hako
Lifted Dreams
description: A chill rips away the warm, summer sun, stripping away the dreams of three ambitious youngsters: Jeff, Faye, and Chelsea. Each has lost their previously budding talents in some unknown mishap. Bound by the bond of their youth, the trio face their struggles in this short tale of ambition and romance.

name: Project Box
description:
Project Box is a Five Nights at Freddy's fan-game being developed by Mediocre Mel. It is based on the book lore rather than the original lore of the games, however it does have contradictions to The Fourth Closet.

During the main sections of gameplay, there are six posts in the rooom you can move to and interact with: The monitor, power breaker, a clock, a large box, and the two doors on opposite sides of the room.

name: Dice Defenders
description: Dice Defenders brings the classic old school feel of many early tower defense games and adds a new level of strategy and planning through the thousands of possible different combinations of different towers, tower sizes, and dice to offer a unique challenge to veterans of the genre and newcomers alike.

name: Let's Get This Bread
description: When in Rome... You steal bread.

name: Chronicles from 4.012
description: Chronicles from 4.012 is a multi-choice otome game and visual novel, that takes place in a cyberpunk world.

name: X-Wars: Clash of Zombies
description:
Get ready for X-War: Clash of Zombies. It is time for you to rise up and fight for your survival in a zombie apocalypse in this strategy adventure!
The deadly T Virus outbreak and infected all the human race. Those dead started turning into zombies and those few survivors that have resistance in their blood turning into mutants. As a leader of mutants, you must recruit Ice Queen, Monkey King, Sword man, Twin-headed dragon and other mutants from fantasy land. Build and defend your homeland, you are the last hope! Create the strongest mutants army, join the epic battle, kill all zombies, lead us to victory!

name: Over REV: Super Technic Challenge Cup
Dynamite Baseball 97
description: Dynamite Baseball 97 is an arcade 3-D baseball game only released in Japan and the sequel to Dynamite Baseball.

name: What Hadjane Says Goes!
description:
Summon minions and rule the underworld in a fantasy action RPG!
The Underworld... A terrifying world of pandemonium, where desires swirl around and demons make their home.

Hadjane is the super-strong Queen who rules over the Underworld. Hadjane has the most power in the whole of the Underworld… But she always does just as she wants, and always, always has to have her own way! Sometimes she works her minions to exhaustion, punishing them severely and treating the demons harshly… Other times, she passes time doing just as she pleases: eating, drinking, and sleeping!
For Hadjane, every single day is like this. Finally, the demons can put up with it no more, and raise a rebellion larger than anyone’s ever seen! Hadjane flies into a crazy rage at this, captures the demons trying to escape, and punishes the rebels until they’re black and blue, while working them ragged!

name: Xonox Double Ender: Artillery Duel/Ghost Manor
Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula: Road to the Evolution
Type II
description: Take control of an automated defense systems protecting planets 40 light years away from Earth. Type II refers to Type II civilization on a Kardashev scale.

name: Drunken Fist Totally Accurate Beat 'em up
You Only Livez Twice
description: A Multiplayer Zombie Apocalypse Survival Game

name: Grashers
description: Grashers is a twin-stick shooter roguelike set in space where you play as an interstellar custodian known as a Grasher who removes junk from the surface of various planets and fights radioactive mutant monsters.

name: Trajes Fatais: Suits of Fate
description: Trajes Fatais: Suits of Fate is a fighting game totally hand-drawn in the classic technique of pixel art with its creators being passionate about classic arcades of the 1990s like The King of Fighters, Street Fighter, and Guilty Gear.

name: Rancid
description: It's time to blast some bugs!!!! Some very very big bugs. Rancid, a 2D side scrolling action adventure, will follow the soldier/investigator Emma Ross as she leads a mission to the strange and mysterious island of Utope.

name: Color Soul: Memories
description: A brand-new stylized game set in a colorless world... in the beginning. Unlock colors as you visit the three different areas of the world and unveil the question of who you are and where you are from after losing your memories.

name: SwarmZ
description: Face massive zombie swarms in this funny post-apocalyptic tactical sandbox! Do you know what it's like to be surrounded by 30,000 zombies? Well, you're about to find out!

name: Phenomenal Car Park Simulator
description: Welcome to Phenomenal Car Park Simulator, a walking simulator for cars - or "driving simulator" - and an absurd journey through the surreal experience of trying to park your car. Or is it...?

name: Venandi In Silva
description: This game is a game to hunt animals in the forest. Aim for a high score by hunting more animals. Enjoy this random game.

name: 伏龙 天元竞擂
description: 在《伏龙·天元竞擂》当中追寻自己的目标，改变自己的命运。经过不懈的修炼，不断的实战，最终达到宏宇之核心，竞武斗法，最终傲立于擂台之上。

name: Shadow of the Road
description: Shadow of the Road is a story-driven, turn-based RPG where feudal Japan meets magic and machine. Assemble your team from a diverse set of characters and test your skills against yōkai and steampunk contraptions. Carve your own path through an immersive story and change the fate of the Empire.

name: Monsters of Kanji 2
description: Help Marty save his galaxy by understanding it.

name: Neon District
description: F2P Cyberpunk RPG like never before. Battle through procedural and story-driven missions to collect characters, gear, juice and parts. Adapt quickly to increasingly difficult enemies and complex puzzles, master the rich trading-card game battle mechanics, and grok tactics to survive in the District.

name: Dusk Golem's Anthology of Horror
description: Three playable horror stories revolving around a witch finding a strange boy near her coven's rural village, an impossibly structured yet abandoned building that's grown scornful and a man haunted by a monstrosity that wants him to take his own life.

name: Karma - A Visual Novel About A Dystopia.
description: 70 years have passed——it is the time for you to payback.Inspired by the sadness and sorrow in Hong Kong through June and July——a story about a dystopia.

name: Fadó
description: Fadó - an old-school indie RPG, rooted in Irish myth!

name: Last Home: Battle of Island
description: Last Home: Battle of Island is an Open World Survival game set in Remote Island. Your task is to survive and make the Island safe to live for others.

name: Pentagonal Saloon Two
description: Pentagonal Saloon Two is a puzzle-adventure game with full of parties. Solve the unique puzzles! Join the parties and find your equipment! Collect your ticket for the big party!

name: Metal Fury 3000
description: Metal Fury 3000 will mix furious shootings, brutal fights, awesome pixel art, real physics, destructible environments, dismembering enemies, a lot of secrets to find, absurdly devastating weapons to use, an amazing Heavy Metal soundtrack (that will split your eardrums) and much more.

name: Survivors Left: X
description: Minimalstic keyboard-based arcade game. In Survivors Left: X you make 50 survivors to pass through dangerous puzzle levels. Quick tip: Don't mess with Crabo.

name: Candle Under Water
description: Light a yellow candle by controlling the water level! Easy action puzzle.

name: Surge Radio
description: Surge Radio is a fast-paced multiplayer game centred around one-hit weapons of stupid proportions. With an array of unique weapons made to encompass different styles of play, mayhem is ensured! Best your opponents in combat, whether they are online, or friends on the couch next to you!

name: Yukkuri Tanoshimu Otona no Jigsaw Puzzle DS: Sekai no Meiga 2 - Inshou-ha, Kouki Inshou-ha no Kyoshou
Yamakawa Shuppansha Kanshuu: Shousetsu Nihonshi DS
Yamakawa Shuppansha Kanshuu: Shousetsu Sekaishi DS
ChainMonsters
description: Join this online multiplayer RPG and experience an open world game inspired by Pokemon. Catch, battle, trade, or explore, and combine different types of monsters and abilities to create your own style of play. No game subscription required.

name: MetrixVR
description: A multiplayer VR and cross-platform game, where you can play multiples gamemodes, build, or hang out with your friends

name: Steelpaw
description: Steelpaw is a 4-player online brawler where cape-bearing, jet-equipped animals compete for glory, financial independence, and high fives all around.

name: The Bomb Project
description: Bombs come falling from the sky, destroying the terrain around you. Face the chaos with the help of one of five agents and their special abilities. You must survive the bullet hell alone, or together with a friend's help... or nuisance.

name: The Last Crystal
description: The Last Crystal is a co-op adventure game for 1 or 2 players. Team up to explore a dangerous magic temple with its lively forest and dark caves, defeat epic foes, join helpful allies, acquire unique powers and solve enigmatic puzzles to unravel the secrets behind the last and most powerful crystal.

name: Wakabayashi Fumie no DS Kabu Lesson
Wi-Fi Taiou Gensen Table Game DS
Umiuru to Sudoku Shiyo!
description: Umiuru to Sudoku Shiyo! is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Genterprise, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Unou no Tatsujin: Hirameki Kosodate My Angel
Utsukushii Nihongo no Kakikata Hanashikata DS
Touhai Densetsu: Akagi DS - Yami ni Maiorita Tensai
The World of Golden Eggs: Nori Nori Uta Dekichatte Kei
The Wonder Pets!: Save the Animals!
The Game Paradise: Crusin Mix Special
Tantei Kibukawa Ryosuke Jiken Tan: The Masquerade Lullaby
Train Your Brain: Nintendo Switch Training for Adults
Cytopia
description: A free, opensource city-building game focusing on moddability and our community.

name: Me and My Shadow
description: A free libre puzzle/platform game in which you try to reach the exit by solving puzzles. Spikes, moving blocks, fragile blocks and much more stand between you and the exit. Record your moves and let your shadow mimic them to reach blocks you couldn’t reach alone.

name: The Legend of Edgar
description: When Edgar's father fails to return home after venturing out one dark and stormy night, Edgar fears the worst: he has been captured by the evil sorceror who lives in a fortress beyond the forbidden swamp. Donning his armour, Edgar sets off to rescue him, but his quest will not be easy. The Legend of Edgar features large levels with different environments, a variety of weapons, a persistent game world that can be travelled through, boss battles, lots of sound effects and music tracks, joypad support with configurable controls, and configurable keyboard support.

name: Totem City
description: The next story about the guy who travels between worlds in a very peculiar way. He changes bodies with his double when he has sex with special girls.

name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
Code Zero
description: A project planned as a series reboot announced ahead of the series 30th anniversary in 2021.

name: House Chores
description:
House Chores is a visual novel where you experience the story of a young man on his summer vacation. Problems arise when he begins to see someone close to him in a much different manner. To make matters worse, two unexpected guests barge in and complicate this messy summer even further!

Can you score it big during your summer vacation? Or will you start the school year empty handed?

name: Daemmerlicht
description: A short and atmospheric adventure, dealing with the theme of powerlessness, set in a surreal nightmare realm. Find three lights, attached to three decisions. Collect remnants of the poor souls that came before you. Explore a dark and ominous world.

name: Towers of Minimalism
description: This is a tower defense game with minimalist design. It encourages strategic thinking and time management. There will be waves of enemies with different features and you must defend your path with strategic tower placement.

name: Stitchcraft
description: Stitchcraft is a two-player strategy game where the cards are actors, not proxies. Weigh decisions to wield your Tapestries as both wares and weapons. Weave a winning Showcase while shrouding your colors and surmising opponents'. If you master one Pattern, choose another for a new set of spells!

name: Meliora's Detective Simulator
description: This game is a text based simulation that focuses on the life of a detective. You must read many different crime stories and find the real criminal in them. An old-school game genre is coming back with modern mechanics and clean graphics.

name: Synthesis Universe: Episode 00
description: Welcome to Synthesis Universe, host of a musical civilization, their technology is music. Experience -Story- through musical experiences happening all around you in real time using UE4.

name: Homer's Odyssey
description: One of the best stories ever written comes as an interactive narrative game. Embark on a perilous journey in the mythological world of ancient Greece, face the wrath of Poseidon, deal with magic, puzzles and destroy your opponents in epic card game duels. Will you be able to reclaim your throne?

name: Hellfo
description: Hellfo is a hardcore platformer game, where you play as a small demon, who is trapped outside of his home and you are here to help him get back. Game has more than 200 handcrafted levels that will test your reaction time, jumping precision and your speed to finish levels in the best time possible.

name: Crazy Shopping
description: The time of life is limited. I just want to tell you one thing. End shopping quickly, accurately, and brilliantly.

name: Convenience Store
description: "Convenience Store" is a classic convenience store operating simulation game. The original version was released in 2005 and re-launched on Steam in 2019.

name: One Hour Left
description: Espionage is hard work. You will have to get to the enemy base and pretend to be your own among strangers. Can you cope with your task and can you prevent a war? But remember that you only have one hour left. But remember that you only have one hour left.

name: Gridcannon Evolution
description: Gridcannon is a tactical solitaire card game where the player attempts to eliminate all royal cards (Jack, Queen, King) by strategically placing number cards on a grid.

name: Orbital Shipyards
description: Build, Explore, Fight. Build a ship of your imagination, explore the vast cosmos, and fight for your stake in the galaxy.

name: Taxi Simulator
description: Become a taxi driver and experience for yourself the everyday life in such interesting profession. One might think that working behind a taxi wheel is a dull and nondescript task. But you couldn't be more wrong! In Taxi Simulator you will play as a shady rap driver and drive through the wildly urban areas.

name: Kendo
description: Kendo is a room-scale VR Kendo Training Application.

name: Yuuki
description: Yuuki is a heartfelt raising simulation game. Look after a cute and fluffy foxgirl for a few months. Raise her well and help turn her life around.

name: Tile Conqueror
description: Tile Conqueror is a strategy game. Build your base, expand your army, conquer tiles and get crystals. Buy permanent upgrades with the crystals you collect to upgrade your army and buildings to conquer stronger tiles.

name: Sister Adventure
description: Sister Adventure - A platform game with elements of puzzles, overcoming various traps, collecting keys and opening chests. The game has elements of clothing and weapons that you can equip on your hero.

name: Children of the Eclipse
description: Children of the Eclipse is a traditional 2-player retro shooter at heart, wrapped in next gen graphics, set in a unique far future utopian sci-fi world teeming with life.

name: Pumpkin Smasher VR
description: It's the day after Halloween and all the pumpkins have to be smashed! Smash pumpkins as fast as possible. But avoid black cats!

name: You Never Listen
description: Hayley finds her apartment empty. The love of her life packed and gone. What starts as a search for an answer soon turns into a personal journey. Was her life as perfect as she remembers it ? With each new clue she finds, the truth becomes more and more unbelievable.

name: Metal Max Xeno Reborn 2
description: A sequel to Metal Max Xeno, and the remake Metal Max Xeno Reborn.

name: Mini Tank
description: Mini tank is a simple style of strategy shooting game.It's hard to forget the impact of the game. Ready?Enter the mini tank world with me!

name: Deat Diablo
description: 《BEAT DIABLO》 is a fast-paced game that combines two types of games: Audio game and rouglike adventure. The game refers to the famous work《Crypt of the NecroDancer》, adding popular and classic characters and monsters, adding novel mechanisms and checkpoints, focusing on strengthening the props system, making personalized costumes and...

name: Golf98
description: Become the new Tiger Woods! In Golf 98 relive your moments of pleasure in arcade! Make your problems in a minimum of shots and score the highest score!

name: The Maze of Horror
description: You wake up inside a horrible maze of terror. The unknown dangers lurk behind every corner and the exit is locked. Make your way through the Maze and find the three skulls to escape the horror of the Surreal maze.

name: Path of Thalanos
description: Path of Thalanos is a roguelike dungeon crawler with a rich random item and skill system. Encounter many random generated events, shrines, traps and enemies. Build your hero and find out how deep you can go into the dungeon. Each run is unique.

name: Three Little Bears
description: A great adventure of three little bears. Be the bear you want to be or... be them all. Riddles, puzzles and quite a lot of magic. Three bears, three adventures, one big goal. Can you reach it?

name: Dungeon Chest
description: Find the fabled Treasure of Akzbezth in this charming retro puzzle game!

name: Discoverer
description: Discoverer is a game of exploration and discovery. You must locate new lands while searching for the Land of Energy and attempts to save the destiny of the world.

name: Arbitology: Dei Gratia Rex
description: A game of storytelling and kingly life simulation in an alt-historical 12th century England. Make your choices wisely, for they affect history itself. Live and die well — prove you are, by the grace of God, king.

name: Warden
description: Play as a Warden, the sole protector of a small village from sadistic entities that come from the Mist. A simulation role-playing game most easily described as "The Witcher meets Stardew...

name: Afterbern
description: Hack, slash, and unleash the fury of the 99%!

name: Orion13
description: Orion13 is a fast-paced first person virtual reality hack-n-slash sword combat adventure.

name: Double Invasion!!
description: Double Invasion!! is an exciting puzzle adventure. Guide an army of nano-bots through your alien organs to solve puzzles, cure your infected body, and drive out the invading germs!

name: Drums of War
description: Drums of War is a virtual reality music rhythm game where you play as a powerful orc drummer who uses the power of the drums to kill filthy dwarf scum, burn their villages to the ground and free fellow orcs in a cross between Overlord and Donkey Kong Jungle beat.

name: DoSK
description: DoSK - Defense Of Soul Keepers. 3D Action RPG game. Player defense their castle from enemies with their ability and purchased items. There are 8 heroes Player can choose: TangSan, DuongHao, Mubai, Oscar, HongJun, XiaoWu, RongRong, ZhuZhu.

name: Sageball
description: Sage Ball is a local multiplayer sports game where players choose from one of several magical users to compete in scoring points by getting the ball in the other player's goal.

name: Kill the Moon
description: Kill The Moon is an action packed, rogue-lite, run and gun with randomized levels and tons of wacky powers.

name: Rolling Rumble
description: Rolling Rumble goes back to the roots of arcade shooters. You don't need to worry about running out of ammo or stamina, just have fun shooting other players. Collect power ups to gain an advantage over your online opponents! Each map has its own unique style of gameplay.

name: Corporate America
description: Corporate America is a fast paced multiplayer shooter, where you shoot emails to your coworkers in intense competitive matches online and off to see who is the best corporate shill.

name: A Time Paradox
description: The first infiltration game against oneself! Alone or with friends, get out of the time loop without creating a paradox.

name: Aesop's Fables: A New Approach
description: Aesop is a famous storyteller from Ancient Greece. The best fables of him are reinterpreted and modernized for a visual novel experience. All of these short stories are purely family-friendly and full with life lessons.

name: Necrofugitive
description: Necrofugitive is a brutal 2D action platformer about the prison escape of an evil shapeshifter and his attempts to evade the realm's justice. Experience fast paced combat and intense fight or flight decisions as you are pursued by lawmen and merciless bounty hunters.

name: Lost Action Hero
description: Meet the best blockbuster from 1989 - Lost Action Hero!.. WHAT?! You oveslept your film shooting? Hurry up and run to studio and try to find your film set before producer become totally mad ! Shoot at everything, search hidden places, collect all Shmoscars statuettes.

name: Farmington County
description: Farming & country living sim, set in a realistic small-town America. Develop the farm of your dreams using tools, tractors, trucks & other vehicles. Build cabins, sheds, barns, garages & more using a free-form building system. Grow thousands of crops, raise hundreds of livestock and expand your business.

name: Legendary gun
description: The background of the game is similar to the World War II. There is a small village in China which is often plundered by the enemy. In order to survive, players assume the role of a heroic warrior and fight the aggressors to defend the homeland and the people.

name: Draconic Route
description: In the 1980s arcade game taste, stoic and polished tactics.

name: Eight Stones
description: Play as a small spider. Return the eight stones to their rightful place on the Monument.

name: Drawn Down Abyss
description: Drawn Down Abyss is a platformer card game that takes a unique action oriented approach. Travel down The Abyss in the search for the bottom. On your way down, you'll be forced to defend yourself from a wide variety of enemies using your own custom built deck for special abilities.

name: Blockey: Block Yeah!
description: Simple Hockey. Simple Shapes. Simple Fun.
